title: League of Legends of Battle System - Novel Updates
tags: e-Sports   Fanfiction   Game Elements   Gamers   Male Protagonist   Modern Day   Parody

description: A no name passers-by, time and again the ultimate operation, a perfect mvp. He is the league’s number one master! Long-term dominate the national dress, Hanbok first! He hoisted all the king, abused professional players, eventually led the team to win the world championship, become the first ray of League of Legends! All this because of the emergence of a magical system!>
